ms_copies_parts: Prague, Národní Muzeum, XLLC-97. 'Num. 3'. The first movement is entitled 'Larchetto alla francese'.
sources.first_edition: April, 1773, Paris, Vénier: Op. 11 no. 6 (for title, see No. 177).
later_editions: (c. 1775), Venice, Marescalchi-Canobbio: no. 3 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1780), Venice, Zatta: no. 3 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1780), London, Preston: Op. 11 no. 3 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1785), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 8 no. 6 (for title, see No. 178).
(c. 1785), London, Welcker: Op. 11 no. 3 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1790?), Paris, Boyer: Op. 11 no. 6 (for title, see No. 177).

partial_notes: This appears to be a complete entry for G.182
